text: Mozilla Add-ons is the official Mozilla website to store add-ons for Mozilla software. This software includes Mozilla Firefox, Mozilla Thunderbird, SeaMonkey, and Mozilla Sunbird. These add-ons include extensions, themes, dictionaries, search bar "search engines", and plugins. == History == Mozilla Update (UMO, update.mozilla.org) is the oldest name of Mozilla Add-ons. AMOwiki is a non-official name for Mozilla Add-ons today. == Structure == Add- on developers are thousands of volunteers. Not Mozilla employees.about After an upload, add-ons are reviewed. If accurate, they're published. == References == Category:Mozilla
title: Mozilla Add-ons
